name: Clutch Champions
description:
In Clutch Champions you can:


~Do a lot of amazing clutches, tricks and (even!) challenges!

~Kill tons of enemies!

~Fight with your worst enemies (or best friends) thru multiplayer or for top score on the leader boards!

~Play on slot machine to get amazing rewards!

~Have even more fun experimenting with power ups and jump over a whole sea of obstacles thru that whole adventure!

~Or go fishing if you want to just sit and chill!

There's a lot of cool power ups, like spyglass that lets you see enemies before they even have a chance to hurt you or lucky block that gives you random powerup to play with!
You can unlock and use them to make your game even more fun to play in more unique ways!

If You're new try playing tutorial to learn how to play, it will help! Even if you are still not convinced there's epic reward waiting for you at the end!

Good luck and have fun!
